text: James or Jim McCord may refer to: * James W. McCord Jr. (1924–2017), American CIA officer and Watergate scandal figure * James I. McCord (1919–1990), Canadian-born president of Princeton Theological Seminary * Jim Nance McCord (1879–1968), American journalist and governor of Tennessee * Jim McCord (American football) (1932–2009), American football coach
title: James B. McCord
